sentences.en: " And Fernand ,'said Caderousse with a chuckle; " Fernand, too, is invited! "
sentences.cn: “ 弗尔南多呢, ” 卡德鲁斯说完便格格地笑了几声, “ 也请他去吗? ”

sentences.en: C: It's hard not to try to ( chuckle and sigh ).
sentences.cn: 不弄,也很难 ( 咯咯的笑,然后叹了口气 ).

sentences.en: Dead men don't bite, you know,'I added, with a chuckle.
sentences.cn: 你不是说过吗, 死人是不咬人的. ” 我笑着又说.

sentences.en: He shook his head with a soft chuckle.
sentences.cn: 他轻轻地笑着摇了摇头.

sentences.en: How he'll chuckle over this news!
sentences.cn: 听到这个消息他会多开心哪!

sentences.en: I couldn't suppress a soft chuckle at the thought of it.
sentences.cn: 想到这个,我忍不住轻轻地笑起来.

sentences.en: Miss Murdstone gave a hoarse chuckle.
sentences.cn: 枚得孙小姐哑着嗓子咯咯地一笑.

sentences.en: She gave a chuckle of delight.
She gave a mean chuckle, but involuntarily lowered her voice slightly.
sentences.cn: 她恶意的笑了, 可是不由她自己似的把声音稍放低了些.

sentences.en: The banker chuckled and said, "Of course not."
sentences.cn: 银行家轻声笑了，说道，“当然不。”

sentences.en: Today I unearthed a copy of "90 Minutes" and had a chuckle at your article.
sentences.cn: 今天我找到了一期《90分钟》杂志，读了你的文章咯咯笑了半天。

sentences.en: Whatever your complaint is, try to get a chuckle out of it.
sentences.cn: 不论你有什麽埋怨, 设法一笑了之.

sentences.en: With a faint chuckle ,. Yaming slipped on the gloves.
sentences.cn: 王亚明就在轻微的笑声里边戴起了手套.

trans.tran_cn: 轻声地笑， 咯咯地笑
trans.tran_en: When you chuckle, you laugh quietly
